title: Detailed studies have revealed that there are two distinct classes of gays: Masculine Gays & Feminine...

attachments.displayName:
Detailed studies have revealed that there are two distinct classes of gays: Masculine Gays & Feminine Gays. Both are, indeed, homosexuals and attracted towards men only for sexual satisfaction and emotional security but with different intentions due to their characteristics.

According to medical experts, behaviors of both classes of gays are entirely different due to structural difference in their genes. A masculine gay is physically well built and prefers a comparatively weak and good looking companion where as a feminine gay is always beauty conscious and interested in physically strong lover.

Their body languages are opposite. Both behave differently while performing the same function. While hugging, the masculine tends to hold his beloved from lower part of his back where as the arms of the feminine will go towards neck of his lover. A feminine aspires to be kissed where as the top is more interested in kissing his beloved. Similarly, their behavior is different in all sexual and emotional exercises. They draw happiness from their respective functions only.

With well-defined & natural roles, relationship between a masculine gay and a feminine gay becomes very easy and as spontaneous as that of a normal man and woman. They can make couples; live together to lead a very happy and well satisfied married life. However, it is not so. Why is it so?

Firstly, we have not recognized gays as a separate entity. To be a gay is a curse; a matter of shame. In advanced societies, where gayism has been given recognition, no arrangements exist for their get together. Gays have established clubs in various metropolitans on their own but their purpose is not constructive. These are the places meant for fun and ecstasy.

It has been concluded by various agencies, that not all men engaged in homosexuality are gays. Most of them are normal, straight men and are active for fulfilling lust with ease. Girls are not easily available due to ban on flesh trading. Call girls demand lot of money and one has to spend a lot in arrangements to enjoy with them. It is easy, economical & legally safe to satisfy sexual needs with some one of your gender.

The phenomenon prevalent in hostellers and army men for long has been adopted by straight men in the name of being a versatile gay. Two men become versatile to satisfy their sexual urge one by one.

In fact, versatility does not exist in gays at all.

According to medical experts, behaviors of masculine & feminine gays are entirely different due to structural difference in their genes and they are unable to perform opposite to their nature. Fake gays have spoilt the genuineity of real gays, which are very small in number.

There have been many cases when medical personnel successfully changed gender of transgenders and now, they are blessed with a happy and natural sex life. We wish same bliss for all human beings irrespective of their sexual orientation
(Continued)
